snippet.title: Bionicle Heroes【FULL GAME】walkthrough | Longplay
snippet.description:
Bionicle Heroes is a video game released by Traveller's Tales in 2006. The game is made of 25 levels and the players must solve puzzles, destroy enemies and upgrade the heroes with unique weapons and special attacks. bionicle heroes full walkthrough gameplay
   Vezok's Coastline
0:00:00 Piraka Bluff
0:23:30 Smugglers Cove
0:33:40 Shattered Wreck
0:50:50 Vezok's Deluge
   Thok's Mountain
1:05:20 Flooded Lowlands
1:23:20 Mountain Path
1:40:20 Blizzard Peaks
2:01:50 Thok's Grotto
   Hakann's Volcano
2:15:20 Scorched Earth
2:33:00 Volcanic Trail
2:51:00 Fiery Mine 
3:07:40 Hakann's Pit
   Zaktan's Jungle
3:21:01 Logging Post
3:39:00 Ancient Forest
3:55:45 Forgotten Shrine
4:14:37 Zaktan's Chamber
   Reidak's Desert
4:24:43 Desert Outpost
4:44:41 Bleak Refinery
4:58:36 Ancient Citadel
5:16:55 Reidak's Bastion
   Avak's Stronghold
5:35:43 Decrepit Dungeons
5:53:08 Cleansing Plant
6:12:10 Menacing Keep
6:28:26 Avak's Dynamo

6:41:02 Vezon's Awakening
6:48:58 Credits

All Bosses ➤ https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tnh9C_ajTWk
More Longplays Playlist ➤ https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=10G4WfTPey8&list=PLoVfQYpOBzfwd2XeV7Z8CbkO2BuevmMPK

Developer: Traveller's Tales
Publisher: Eidos Interactive
Platforms: PC, PS2, Xbox 360, Wii, GC, GBA, Nintendo DS
Release Date: 2006
Genre: Action, Adventure
